title: Condo-Quality Jr. 1 Bedroom - HW Floors, Granite, Balcony, W/D, Gym,
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $1,900 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 12/21/2019
Pet: Pet Friendly
This small but smart 1-bedroom layout is perfect for those looking for a true 1B/1B but at current Studio price.
You get laundry in-unit, hardwood floors , balcony, and updated kitchen.
Building amenities include package service, gym, rooftop wading pool and grill stations.
For quickest response, call or text Randy at 843-345-2369
Originally built as condos, this mid-rise property is more boutique than commercial, offering a quiet neighborhood feel with the best of managed apartment living.
La Cantina Grill, Coast Sushi and Overflow Coffee Bar are just out the door.
Close to the CTA Green Line and with easy access to Lake Shore Drive, it’s perfect for north or south commutes.
Or, if you’re heading west, I-55 is just a couple blocks away.
The rooftop amenities include a soaking pool, grilling stations and lounge area with amazing views and sunsets.
There is also an on-site gym.
With more than 50 unique layouts, all have hardwood cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.
Central air, in-unit washers and dryers and a balcony in every unit give it the finishing touches you’re looking for.
Parking is available on-site at an additional charge.
Cats and dogs are accepted throughout and there is a rooftop dog run (breed and weight restrictions apply).
FEATURES
Balcony-All Units
Central Air-Yes
Dishwasher-All
Dogs-No Weight Limit
Flooring-Hardwood Only
Laundry- W/D In Unit

Luxury Property

Stove-Gas
